alert.note: Alert for Maries; Miller (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 9:37PM CDT until August 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Flood Watch Expanded into Benton...Camden and Morgan Counties... .Strong to severe storms were repeatedly developing over central Missouri this evening. Several rounds of heavy rainfall will likely lead to flash flooding. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of central Missouri, east central Missouri, and south central Missouri, including the following areas, in central Missouri, Maries, Miller, and Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent. * Through Thursday morning * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
